title: Ticket #2228: Have a command-line flag to run DAGMan in recovery mode?
description: It might be useful (both for testing and for user recovery in certain cases) to have a command-line flag to condor_submit_dag and condor_dagman that caused DAGMan to run in recovery mode. (Right now you have to touch the right lock file to get DAGMan to go into recovery mode.)
